item.description:
"Chime in" from 9 - 10 pm on the phone ...

Open Forum
Bring your questions, receive suggestions, share your LOA experiences, learn from each other, get to know each other. These are the BIG reasons why we're part of this community, right?


Telephone Number
Will be emailed to you when you RSVP "YES"

Note: the Tele-conferencing line used is accessed via a long distance call; not toll-free.

"WOW" comments from folks who had participated in the past:

" I really enjoyed the meetup, and was surprised how well everything went considering it was over the phone. There was a lot of good information and examples shared by several people. " - Erik Sabin

â€œ This was the first meetup I attended with Boston LOA and absolutely loved it. ... It was just great to hear other people's experiences." - psubabe

" Was inspiring, even half way through... Thanks for hosting this call, these sharings definitely help keep me pointed in the right direction.. And I like not having to travel anywhere.. Even tho I do enjoy meeting w the group. - Diane

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: BostonLOA TELE-Meetup: Get your pressing questions answered
